Title: Gekitou! Crush Gear Turbo
Description: ["After losing almost all their members the Tobita Crush Gear club is facing extinction. Kouya who dreams of being a Crush Gear Fighting Champion doesn't want to see the club become extinct and will do whatever he can to keep the club running and become a Cush Gear Champion."]
Related: ['Adaptation: Gekitou! Crush Gear Turbo', 'Spin-off: Crush Gear Nitro', 'Sequel: Gekitou! Crush Gear Turbo: Kaizabaan no Chousen']
Characters: ['Manganji, Takeshi', 'Jin, Kyousuke', 'Marume, Kuroudo', 'Marino, Kouya', 'Oriza, Jirou', 'Tobita, Lilika']
Voices: ['Sasanuma, Akira', 'Sakamoto, Chika', 'Shindo, Naomi', 'Matsumoto, Megumi', 'Shitanda, Michael', 'Neya, Michiko']
